alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:03AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SPARTANBURG COUNTY UNTIL 200 AM EDT... At 102 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 6 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Roebuck, moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Spartanburg, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Roebuck, Reidville, Moore, Woodruff, Pauline and Cross Anchor. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
